attributes.action: stop non christians taking leadership roles in the christian unions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it is allowed for non-christians to lead the christian youth then I am afraid that they would not be led at all.  You could end up with some serious problems.  Jesus needs to be the centre of each leader otherwise it is meaningless without him.  Jesus is the truth, the life and the way and without him we can do nothing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
